subject: Shipping
description_text:
Do you ship to India?
If yes then what courier service is used and how much is shipping charges?

conversations.body_text: Hi Ramandeep Singh Sandhu,     We ship to India, but shipping costs are relatively high. You can select a shipping option on the checkout page. We typically use FedEx or DHL for shipping.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-pro-plus-x-pedals

Shipping will be free for order above $400?
And can you create a lower value invoice?

On Tue, 5 Aug, 2025, 9:36â€¯am service@simsonn.com,
Hi Ramandeep Singh Sandhu,    Yes, we can provide invoices for smaller amounts. If you have specific requirements, please let us know.
